summary: Adds craftable silver arrows and bolts which deal extra damage to undead and werebeasts
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-7.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56679-1-1424901016.png[/img]




[img]http://static-7.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56679-2-1424901016.png[/img][/center][center]
This is a simple mod that adds craftable and purchasable silver arrows and bolts to the game.





[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56679-1-1424901473.png[/img]
They have the same base damage as steel arrows & bolts but they do +20 damage to undead (draugr,ghosts,vampires,bonemen,wisp,dragon priest etc) and werebeasts (werewolves and werebears).

They can be crafted at any forge (for now :P Dawnguard reqiurement is on the way).
Steel Smithing Perk is required for crafting. A silver ingot and a firewood yield 24 arrows or 10 bolts. 

Merchants those sell arrows now sell silver arrows, merchants those sell bolts (there are only two: Gunmar and Sorine) now sell silver bolts.

Silverhand archers carry silver arrows and and Dawnguard archers carry silver bolts.

Unfortunatelly, in Skyrim, Vigilants of Stendarr do not use bows and crossbows therefore no silver arrows/bolts added to them.



The meshes, textures and other stuff are from Sunhallowed arrows and steel bolts from Dawnguard DLC. Sunhallowed arrows seemed more closer to bright/burning/blessed to me. Until I find or create better ones, they are what I got.  I have plans to add retextures of some existent arrows and bolts to look like silvermade, thanks to a friend :D[/center]





[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56679-2-1424901473.png[/img]

Best to use Nexus Mod Manager.
Download it and then activate it. Endorse it, if you like :D

I haven't test it yet but for now it is best to use it with Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs.[/center]


[center][b][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56679-4-1424901473.png[/img][/b]

[list][*] [/list][list]To add some kind of Dawnguard Faction/Quest requirement for crafting(ON THE WAY)[/list][list][*]I am thinking about to change the look of silver arrow to nordic arrows, what do you think? Please leave a comment[/list][/center]




[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56679-3-1424901473.png[/img]
If the arrows (and bolts) hit walls,grounds and other static objects  (but not enemies/npcs) they disappear. From what I've learn this is due to the way I enchant the arrows. I will be looking for a solution.
If another undead/werebeast is very very close to the target, it may take the extra damage from the enchanment. Again, this is due to the way I enchant the arrows. I will be looking for a solution.[/center]





This my first mod. I always wanted silver arrows and bolts to deal with vampires, werewolves, ghosts, draugr and other "dark-side" creatures. Switching equipment according to enemy... Just like Witcher games, just like Supernatural (TV series)... There are couple of silver arrow mods but I did not like them so I made one. It is mainly for role-playing purposes. 

English is not my mother language, please forgive my mistakes.


I will be updating
[center]
[img]http://static-7.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56679-1-1424901016.png[/img][/center]
